page.title: 11THE WOODS IN THE AREA
page.content:
THE SCHOOL WOODS ________________ The woods in our area are very overgrown with brambles,overgrown grass and weeds.Many children play in the woods and destroy its natural beauty by throwing litter in it.
STANMER WOODS _____________ Stanmer wood is very large and has very wide pathways,which have been trod down.A lot of people spend their' leisure time walking around the wood, although rapes and attacks are not unknown.The woods are also used for cross-country running,and horse trials.
By Ruth Henshaw and Joanne Ford.
